full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA'I LHA RNAMS KYI RJES GNANG BYA TSUL GYI ZUR 'DEBS BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA NAS BSHAD PA'I LHA RNAMS KYI RJES GNANG BYA TSUL GYI ZUR 'DEBS BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I MCHOG 'PHAGS PA KUN DGA' PO DANG CHOS MTSUNGS, MDO SNGAGS YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I DE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BKA' 'GYUR BA CHEN PO SGROM MDA' MKHAN PO SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO'I BKA' BTZAL NAN CHER PHEB PA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO DANG, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO RNAM GNYIS KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO BA, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS KYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG DON GRUB PO, ,BKRA SHIS BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
